data.title: “Nobody got that even today”: Arnold Schwarzenegger’s One Body Part Even Intimidates 8 Times Mr Olympia Ronnie Coleman
data.meta_description: Both Ronnie Coleman and Arnold Schwarzenegger are considered to be two of the greatest bodybuilders ever. Coleman expressed his admiration
data.text:
Before becoming an actor, Arnold Schwarzenegger was a professional bodybuilder who inspired many people about the importance of fitness and physical strength. He is a 7 time Mr. Olympian and is an influential figure in the bodybuilding world as one of the greats.

Advertisement

His workout routines, diets, and physical shape at the time were unprecedented and no one could replicate his level of dedication and output. The only individual who has managed to even be considered to be in his ballpark is Ronnie Coleman who has won the Mr. Olympia title 8 times.

The two bodybuilders are constantly compared and debated among fans as to who is the better one. Coleman has also talked about how the former champ has inspired him and helped him become a better version of himself. He also talked about how Schwarzenegger will always be at the top, pointing to a specific body part that no one will be able to replicate.

Advertisement

Also read: “I just saw him as a bulldozer”: Arnold Schwarzenegger Almost Lost His Most Famous Role as the Terminator Due To the Silliest Reason

Ronnie Coleman Claims Arnold Schwarzenegger Has the Biggest Chest Ever

Both Ronnie Coleman and Arnold Schwarzenegger are considered to be two of the greatest bodybuilders ever. They have won the prestigious Mr. Olympia title multiple times and have inspired bodybuilders all around the world. Coleman also opened up about how Schwarzenegger is a force to be reckoned with.

Coleman talked to the Valuetainment YouTube channel about how he holds a significant record that no one will be able to beat by saying,

Advertisement

“Well, I’m in a lot better condition. But Arnold this guy is so big, so greater shape. Arnold would have been a far the best bodybuilder ever. Nobody could even touch him. Look at that shape, look at that chest. Nobody got that even today. He’s got the biggest chest ever.”

Coleman’s comments are a sign of respect from one bodybuilder to another for the unprecedented physical achievements that Schwarzenegger has managed to gain. It also shows Coleman’s humble and generous attitude of stating facts and being authentic as a person.

Also read: Even Arnold Schwarzenegger Had To Accept Defeat Against The Most Genetically Gifted Bodybuilder Of All Time Sergio Oliva

Arnold Schwarzenegger Claims He is Currently in the Fourth Act of His Life

Arnold Schwarzenegger recently sat down and talked about his upcoming book Be Useful: Seven Tools for Life with People’s Magazine. When asked why he claims he’s living in the fourth act of his life and the idea of contentment, he said,

Advertisement

“I don’t know what you mean by contentment. I’m always content, but I’m always hungry for more. I slept with my first trophy. No one could take it away. But at the same time, the other foot is already out of bed going for the second Mr. Universe title. [He went on to win three more, followed by seven Mr. Olympia titles.] Today I feel good where I am. I’m much wiser now. I’m much smarter. I think more about people. I think more about people’s feelings.”

Schwarzenegger recently released a three-part docuseries based on his life called Arnold on Netflix. His recent Netflix action comedy series FUBAR was also renewed for a second season. It seems Schwarzenegger is having the best time of his life personally and professionally.

Also read: Bodybuilding Legend Who Has Won Mr Olympia More Times Than Arnold Schwarzenegger Spent Insane Amount of Money on Food to Become a 300 lbs Heavy Monster

Sources: YouTube, People’s Magazine
